sec.code:
library(tidyr) library(dplyr) ## library(RColorBrewer) ## library(lme4)
# load data ## BDNF ###bdnf <- read_excel("Rohdaten/BDNF_Neuroplastizität_Alter_CpGs_ohne_m11_und_p36_mit_verhalten_vollständig.xlsx") bdnf <- as_tibble(read.table('/Users/kobi/Desktop/Promotionsdatananalyse mit Excel und Martin/Promotion (Quarto Manuscript)/tables/Ausgangstabellen/bdnf.txt', sep = "\t", header = TRUE, row.names = NULL, quote = "")) head(bdnf)

boxed-text.preformat: # A tibble: 6 × 44 TraceFileName ID Standort Zeitpunkt_als_Zahl Zeitpunkt Platte Group Gruppe <chr> <int> <int> <int> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> 1 BDNF-C1_001_0… 1 0 1 T0 Pl1 Cont… Contr… 2 BDNF-C1_001_0… 1 0 2 T1 Pl2 Cont… Contr… 3 BDNF-C1_002_0… 2 0 1 T0 Pl1 Piano Piano 4 BDNF-C1_002_0… 2 0 2 T1 Pl2 Piano Piano 5 BDNF-C1_002_0… 2 0 3 T2 Pl3 Piano Piano 6 BDNF-C1_003_0… 3 0 1 T0 Pl1 Piano Piano # ℹ 36 more variables: Gruppe_als_zahl <int>, Koordinate <chr>, m148 <dbl>, # m111 <dbl>, m087 <dbl>, m066 <dbl>, m058 <dbl>, m039 <dbl>, m035 <dbl>, # m024 <dbl>, p018 <dbl>, p020 <dbl>, Code <chr>, Sex <chr>, Age_start <int>, # B03a_sleep_quality <int>, B03b_sleep_duration <dbl>, # B03c_sleep_to_recover <dbl>, B09a_groesse <int>, B09b_gewicht <dbl>, # B14a_rauchen <int>, rauchen <int>, B14d_wie_viele_zigaretten <chr>, # B14b_rauchen_anfang <int>, B14c_raucherjahre <dbl>, …

sec.code: write.table(bdnf, file = "/Users/kobi/Desktop/Promotionsdatananalyse mit Excel und Martin/Promotion (Quarto Manuscript)/tables/Ausgangstabellen/bdnf.txt", sep = "\t", row.names = FALSE, quote = FALSE) ##Tau ### tau <- read_excel("Rohdaten/TAU_CpGs_mit_verhalten_ohne_p61_p59_p34_p29.xlsx") tau <- as_tibble(read.table('/Users/kobi/Desktop/Promotionsdatananalyse mit Excel und Martin/Promotion (Quarto Manuscript)/tables/Ausgangstabellen/tau.txt', sep = "\t", header = TRUE, row.names = NULL, quote = "")) head(tau)

## PSD95 ### psd95 <- read_excel("Rohdaten/PSD95_CpGs_mit_verhalten_gr̨ößer.xlsx") psd95 <- as_tibble(read.table('/Users/kobi/Desktop/Promotionsdatananalyse mit Excel und Martin/Promotion (Quarto Manuscript)/tables/Ausgangstabellen/psd95.txt', sep = "\t", header = TRUE, row.names = NULL, quote = "")) head(psd95)

#data set with all CpGs in columns for EDA and PCA ##cpg <- read_excel("Excel seit Martin/031024_All_Genes_Explorative Datenanylse.xlsx") cpg <- as_tibble(read.table(file = '/Users/kobi/Desktop/Promotionsdatananalyse mit Excel und Martin/Promotion (Quarto Manuscript)/tables/Ausgangstabellen/cpg.txt', sep = "\t", header = TRUE, row.names = NULL, quote = "")) head(cpg)

boxed-text.preformat: # A tibble: 6 × 116 TraceFileName.BDNF ID.BDNF Zeitpunkt.BDNF Group.BDNF m148.BDNF m111.BDNF <chr> <int> <chr> <chr> <dbl> <dbl> 1 BDNF-C1_001_01_T0_Pl1_C… 1 T0 Controll 0.18 0.23 2 BDNF-C1_001_02_T1_Pl2_C… 1 T1 Controll 0.07 0.08 3 BDNF-C1_002_01_T0_Pl1_P… 2 T0 Piano 0.14 0.14 4 BDNF-C1_002_02_T1_Pl2_P… 2 T1 Piano 0 0.1 5 BDNF-C1_002_03_T2_Pl3_P… 2 T2 Piano 0.16 0.07 6 BDNF-C1_003_01_T0_Pl1_P… 3 T0 Piano NA NA # ℹ 110 more variables: m087.BDNF <dbl>, m066.BDNF <dbl>, m058.BDNF <dbl>, # m039.BDNF <dbl>, m035.BDNF <dbl>, m024.BDNF <dbl>, p018.BDNF <dbl>, # p020.BDNF <dbl>, TraceFileName.Tau <chr>, ID.Tau <int>, Zeit.Tau <chr>, # Gruppe.Tau <chr>, m337.Tau <dbl>, m331.Tau <dbl>, m323.Tau <dbl>, # m315.Tau <dbl>, m310.Tau <dbl>, m306.Tau <dbl>, m300.Tau <dbl>, # m293.Tau <dbl>, m287.Tau <dbl>, m277.Tau <dbl>, m249.Tau <dbl>, # m219.Tau <dbl>, m210.Tau <dbl>, m207.Tau <dbl>, m187.Tau <dbl>, …

sec.code: write.table(cpg, file = "/Users/kobi/Desktop/Promotionsdatananalyse mit Excel und Martin/Promotion (Quarto Manuscript)/tables/Ausgangstabellen/cpg.txt", sep = "\t", row.names = FALSE, quote = FALSE)

# Subsetting ## BDNF ### subset(x=⟨Datensatz⟩, subset=⟨Auswahl Zeilen⟩, select=⟨Auswahl Spalten⟩) bdnf_subset <- subset(bdnf, select = c(ID, Standort, Zeitpunkt, Gruppe, Sex, Age_start, CogTel))
#Alternative, die eigentlich gehen müsste #bdnf_subset_v <- bdnf[,c("ID", "Standort", "Zeitpunkt", "Gruppe", "Sex", "Age_start", "CogTel")] #as.data.frame(bdnf_subset_v) #bdnf[bdnf_subset_v]
### Subset CpGs to calculate mean values for all rows bdnf_methylation <- subset(bdnf, select = c(m148:p020)) #subset the CpGs
bdnf_methylation_mean <- apply(bdnf_methylation, 1, mean, na.rm=TRUE) # apply the mean on all rows (1 = per row) bdnf_methylation_median <- apply(bdnf_methylation, 1, median, na.rm=TRUE)
bdnf_mean <- cbind(bdnf_subset, bdnf_methylation_mean) colnames(bdnf_mean)[8] <- "Mean" bdnf_median <- cbind(bdnf_subset, bdnf_methylation_median) colnames(bdnf_median)[8] <- "Median"
####bdnf_subset$mean <- bdnf_methylation_mean #initial version before median ####bdnf_subset$median <- bdnf_methylation_median
### delete 192 u. 193, because of an confusion in values (look at the code and sex variable) bdnf_mean <- bdnf_mean[!(bdnf_mean$ID %in% c(192, 193)), ] bdnf_mean[bdnf_mean$ID >= 190 & bdnf_mean$ID <= 196, ] #show if deleted
bdnf_median <- bdnf_median[!(bdnf_median$ID %in% c(192, 193)), ] bdnf_median[bdnf_median$ID >= 190 & bdnf_median$ID <= 196, ] #show if deleted

sec.code:
##Tau ### Subset Tau tau_subset <- subset(tau, select = c(ID, standort_aus_andere_quelle, Zeit, Gruppe, Sex, Age_start, CogTel)) colnames(tau_subset)[c(2:3)] <- c("Standort", "Zeitpunkt") #rename column 2
### Subset CpGs to calculate mean values for all rows tau_methylation <- subset(tau, select = c(m331:p27))
tau_methylation_mean <- apply(tau_methylation, 1, mean, na.rm = TRUE) tau_methylation_median <- apply(tau_methylation, 1, median, na.rm = TRUE)
tau_mean <- cbind(tau_subset, tau_methylation_mean) colnames(tau_mean)[8] <- "Mean" tau_median <- cbind(tau_subset, tau_methylation_median) colnames(tau_median)[8] <- "Median"
### delete 192 u. 193 tau_mean <- tau_mean[!(tau_mean$ID %in% c(192, 193)), ] tau_mean[tau_mean$ID >= 190 & tau_mean$ID <= 196, ]

sec.code:
## PSD95 ### Subset Tau psd95_subset <- subset(psd95, select = c(ID, standort_aus_andere_quelle, Zeitpunkt, Gruppe, Sex, Age_start, CogTel)) colnames(psd95_subset)[2] <- "Standort" #rename column 2
### Subset CpGs to calculate mean and median values for all rows psd95_methylation <- subset(psd95, select = c(m465:p122))
psd95_methylation_mean <- apply(psd95_methylation, 1, mean, na.rm = TRUE) psd95_methylation_median <- apply(psd95_methylation, 1, median, na.rm = TRUE)
psd95_mean <- cbind(psd95_subset, psd95_methylation_mean) colnames(psd95_mean)[8] <- "Mean" psd95_median <- cbind(psd95_subset, psd95_methylation_median) colnames(psd95_median)[8] <- "Median"
### delete 192 u. 193 psd95_mean <- psd95_mean[!(psd95_mean$ID %in% c(192, 193)), ] psd95_mean[psd95_mean$ID >= 190 & psd95_mean$ID <= 196, ]

#BDNF ##mean bdnf_mean_T2T0 <- bdnf_mean_wide bdnf_mean_T2T0$T1 <- NULL
bdnf_mean_T2T0 <- bdnf_mean_T2T0 %>% filter(!is.na(T2), !is.na(T0)) %>% mutate(`T2_T0` = T2 - T0) #does "T2_T0" also work?
bdnf_mean_T2T0$CogTel <- as.numeric(bdnf_mean_T2T0$CogTel) bdnf_mean_T2T0$Standort <- as.character(bdnf_mean_T2T0$Standort) is.numeric(bdnf_mean_T2T0$CogTel)

##median bdnf_median_T2T0 <- bdnf_median_wide bdnf_median_T2T0$T1 <- NULL
bdnf_median_T2T0 <- bdnf_median_T2T0 %>% filter(!is.na(T2), !is.na(T0)) %>% mutate(`T2_T0` = T2 - T0) #does "T2_T0" also work?
bdnf_median_T2T0$CogTel <- as.numeric(bdnf_median_T2T0$CogTel) bdnf_median_T2T0$Standort <- as.character(bdnf_median_T2T0$Standort) is.numeric(bdnf_median_T2T0$CogTel)

boxed-text.preformat: # A tibble: 6 × 9 ID Standort Gruppe Sex Age_start CogTel T0 T2 T2_T0 <int> <chr> <chr> <chr> <int> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> 1 2 0 Piano F 76 34.6 0.105 0.085 -0.02 2 4 0 Controll F 75 40.6 0.05 0.08 0.03 3 5 0 Controll F 73 25.6 0.085 0.03 -0.055 4 9 0 Controll F 74 24.4 0.02 0.175 0.155 5 11 0 Piano F 71 30.3 0.065 0.085 0.0200 6 13 0 Controll F 65 42.4 0.05 0.01 -0.04

sec.code:
#Tau ##mean tau_mean_T2T0 <- tau_mean_wide tau_mean_T2T0$T1 <- NULL
tau_mean_T2T0 <- tau_mean_T2T0 %>% filter(!is.na(T2), !is.na(T0)) %>% mutate(`T2_T0` = T2 - T0) #does "T2_T0" also work?
tau_mean_T2T0$CogTel <- as.numeric(tau_mean_T2T0$CogTel) tau_mean_T2T0$Standort <- as.character(tau_mean_T2T0$Standort) is.numeric(tau_mean_T2T0$CogTel)

##median tau_median_T2T0 <- tau_median_wide tau_median_T2T0$T1 <- NULL
tau_median_T2T0 <- tau_median_T2T0 %>% filter(!is.na(T2), !is.na(T0)) %>% mutate(`T2_T0` = T2 - T0) #does "T2_T0" also work?
tau_median_T2T0$CogTel <- as.numeric(tau_median_T2T0$CogTel) tau_median_T2T0$Standort <- as.character(tau_median_T2T0$Standort) is.numeric(tau_median_T2T0$CogTel)
